title.narrative: Basic Education support Khartoum state- Ombeda Karrari and Sharge Alneel localities

description.narrative: CAFOD and Mujadiddun has been supporting communities in Khartoum Peri-Urban areas of Ombeda , Karrari and Shrge Alneel localities. These localities are considered by the Ministry of Education (MoE) as the neediest localities in Khartoum state. The localities are host to vulnerable communities of different types; IDPs, refugees and economically displaced people. Shortage of water and lack of sanitation are key basic needs that hinder the enrolment and upsurge the low rates of children remaining in schools especially girls the public schools. Mujaddidun through support from CAFOD is planning to address these problems to increase enrolment, retention rate in 10 schools. The project has two approvals; Cycle one was running between 01/12/2018 - 30/11/2019 with an extension of 3 months. Cycle 2 approval will cover project intervention from March 2020- Feb 2021. Mujaddidun through CAFOD support is proposing to continue working with the same 10 schools in 03 localities to cover gaps that were not covered in year 2019-2020 interventions. The 10 schools accommodate 6110 (2198 boys and 3912 girls) The school children are the direct project beneficiaries. The project has 05 outcomes; 1.Boys and Girls from disadvantaged community have improved enrolment to formal education. 2.Improved quality education in Basic schools. 3.School-aged children improved hygiene and sanitation knowledge 4.Child friendly feedback mechanism developed in 5 schools. 5. Diversified livelihood and increased income of HHs. The project broad activities are : 1. Construction and rehabilitation of school classroom. 2. Provision of education supply and materials. 3. Formation and support of school health club 4.Support 14 teachers in Comboni school . 5.Capacity strengthening of School teachers and PTAs members 6.Formulation 4 Saving and Loan groups.
